message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $120. I think you'll find it's a great deal for its value.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $90 for it. Looking forward to your response.
Thanks for the offer, Bob.  I could come down a bit to $110. I'm confident you won't find this kind of quality for a better price.
Thank you for adjusting your price, Alice. I appreciate it. However, I am still not able to go above $85 for this product. I hope we can come to an agreement.
